characteristic.name: Functional Suitability
characteristic.description: The degree to which a product or system provides functions that meet stated and implied needs when used under specified conditions.

characteristic.name: Performance Efficiency
characteristic.description: The performance relative to the amount of resources used under stated conditions.

characteristic.name: Compatibility
characteristic.description: The degree to which a product, system or component can exchange information with other products, systems or components, and/or perform its required functions, while sharing the same hardware or software environment.

characteristic.name: Usability
characteristic.description: The degree to which a product or system can be used by specified users to achieve specified goals with effectiveness, efficiency and satisfaction in a specified context of use.

characteristic.name: Reliability
characteristic.description: The degree to which a system, product or component performs specified functions under specified conditions for a specified period of time.

characteristic.name: Security
characteristic.description: The degree to which a product or system protects information and data so that persons or other products or systems have the degree of data access appropriate to their types and levels of authorization.

characteristic.name: Maintainability
characteristic.description: The degree of effectiveness and efficiency with which a product or system can be modified to improve it, correct it or adapt it to changes in environment, and in requirements.

characteristic.name: Portability
characteristic.description: The degree of effectiveness and efficiency with which a system, product or component can be transferred from one hardware, software or other operational or usage environment to another.

property.name: Design
property.description: Design warnings support adherence to the .NET Framework Design Guidelines.

property.name: Globalization
property.description: Globalization warnings support world-ready libraries and applications.

property.name: Interoperability
property.description: Interoperability warnings support interacting with COM clients.

property.name: Maintainability
property.description: Maintainability warnings support library and application maintenance

property.name: Mobility
property.description: Mobility warnings support efficient power usage.

property.name: Naming
property.description: Naming warnings support adherence to the naming conventions of the .NET Framework Design Guidelines.

property.name: Performance
property.description: Performance warnings support high performance libraries and applications.

property.name: Portability
property.description: Portability warnings support portability across different platforms.

property.name: Security
property.description: Security warnings support safer libraries and applications. These warnings help prevent security flaws in your program.

property.name: Usage
property.description: Usage warnings support proper usage of the .NET Framework.
